title: BSTSEL 16"/18"/20" Kids Bike Boys Motocross Bike Kids Dazzling Motorcycle Bike Simulated Motorbike Sound Boys Bicycle Gift With Removable Stabilisers Wheels For Ages 4-8 Years Old
features: 【Kids Bike】: This cool BSTSEL kids bike features a stunning and eye-catching motorcycle design! This is the perfect gift for kids.

【16"/18" Kids Bicycle】: 16" bike for 4-7 years (41" - 53") boys & girls, 18" bike for 6-9 years (43"-59") boys & girls. Note: child height may vary even at the same age, please take the height into consideration.

【Comfortable Soft Seat】: The cool motorcycle-shaped bicycle adopts a thickened leather seat, which makes the child soft and comfortable when riding, and it is not easy to get tired after sitting for a long time, and it is more comfortable.
【Pneumatic tires】: BSTSEL Children's bicycles are made of high-quality rubber tires, with increased tread pattern, anti-skid, wear-resistant, and more durable.
【Stable Auxiliary Wheel】: When children learn to ride a bicycle, they have a safe and stable auxiliary wheel designed with a pyramid triangular structure to prevent rollover and make riding safer.
description: Product Description Product Description: This Cool 16'' 18" Motobike features an awesome eye catching motorbike design! Ideal for encouraging and teaching your little one to ride a bike, it features removable stabilizers to help your child until they are secure enough to ride on their own. Frame Material: Steel Gender: Boys/Girls Wheel Size: 16" 18" Colour: Red and Blue Moto bike has V-brakes. Front suspension for style and performance Mudguards to protect from spray and mud Cool motorbike styling With Stabilizer Age group: 4-8 Moto Bike Design BSTSEL kid’s bikes are ideally prepared for the lovely little ones’ specific requirements. BSTSEL bikes were designed with style in mind. The details are what set this bike apart， All combined these features make up one cool bike. 16" 18" Kids Bicycle Safety is the most important aspect for BSTSEL and characterizes all aspects of the bicycle: child-oriented brake levers with short reach for small hands, above-average width tires for comfort and stable riding, doubly-safe, 2 hand brakes, a front caliper brake and rear band brake. While the high safety standards make parents happy & assured. High Quality Bicycles Made of premium steel to survive the bumps of learning, The bike comes with black tire & single speed, only little maintenance needed due to the simple design.Comes with plastic aesthetic to compliment the bike and finish the look of a motorcross. Comfortable Soft Seat The cool motorcycle-shaped bicycle adopts a thickened leather seat, which makes the child soft and comfortable when riding, and it is not easy to get tired after sitting for a long time, and it is more comfortable. Stable Auxiliary Wheel When children learn to ride a bicycle, they have a safe and stable auxiliary wheel designed with a pyramid triangular structure to prevent rollover and make riding safer. Sturdy Steel Frame Sturdy Steel Frame steel frame is durable and elegant, provides awesome impact resistance. Toggle the handle to make a motorcycle-like roar. V-Type Brake Brake Lever: Shorter travel distance makes it easier for younger riders to grab and squeeze the lever. Brakes: Reliable front caliper brake and rear band brake. Pneumatic Tires Children's bicycles are made of high-quality rubber tires, with increased tread pattern, anti-skid, wear-resistant, and more durable Enclosed Chain Guard protect your child’s legs from getting scratched or dirty from the oily bike chain. You’ll no longer have to worry about your youngster’s fingers or their clothes getting caught up in the chain either. Plus, the bike features front and rear mudguards that will stop at least some of that muddy water from flying out of puddles that they’ll definitely want to ride through!
